Content:
[ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_ChanceOnTurn]% chance to gain Madness when your turn ends.
Madness grants you bonuses and full control over your actions.
When <font color='#FF0000'>disabled</font> (Knocked Down, Stunned, etc), <font color='#FFAB00'>incoming damage is reduced by [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_StunDefense_DamageReduction]%</font>.

When your turn ends, harmful damage-over-time statuses are <font color='#4197E2'>cleansed</font>, restoring <font color='#97FBFF'>[ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_ImmuneBoost_HealPercentage]% Vitality</font> per status.
